ygData.subject: Re: Stein
ygData.msgSnippet: what are the ingredients that are needed so i dont accidentally sell them? ... cash ... and
ygData.messageBody:
what are the ingredients that are needed so i dont accidentally sell them?



> From: Nosferatu <nosferatu@...>
>
>
>
> Jason Cent wrote:
> >
> > From: Jason Cent <jcent@...>
> >
> > You still didn't answer my question, fellas....
> >
> > if it's LORE ITEM then what do you do with the Stein you already
> > have? give it to someone to hold?
>
> Generally (with the three I have done (1 was a friend, other 2 people
> who wanted me to do it for a fee)) I trade them the stein, they give me
> the fee, plus the 4 ingredients (I am not going to run all over north
> for just a bit of cash)
> >
> > Also, is the Book NO DROP or just LORE? I forget....
> >
> > I'd like to complete this quest again to sell one....I need the
cash
> > badly to work on my jewelry some more...I spent over 200pp last night
and
> > went from 43 to 48 in Jewelry. ouch!! that hurts!!
> >
>
> /Nosferatu
